mapper.sql: select recharge_id, oil_card_id, major_id, truck_id, apply_date, recharge_sum, apply_remark, recharge_type, owner_driver_id, order_id, is_passed, fail_remark, recharge_date, month_order_num, month_recharge_sum, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,tenant_id from oil_recharge

select recharge_id, a.oil_card_id, a.major_id, a.truck_id, a.apply_date, a.recharge_sum, a.apply_remark, a.recharge_type, a.owner_driver_id, a.order_id, a.is_passed, a.fail_remark, a.recharge_date, a.month_order_num, a.month_recharge_sum, a.del_flag, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.tenant_id , b.oil_card_number, b.card_type, b.open_card_place, b.amount , d.major_number , t.plate_number, t.attribute, t.truck_owner , c.driver_name, c.is_owner from oil_recharge a left join oil_card b on a.oil_card_id = b.oil_card_id and b.del_flag = '0' left join oil_major AS d on b.major_id = d.major_id and d.del_flag = '0' left join logistics_truckdb.tru_driver AS c on a.owner_driver_id = c.driver_id and c.del_flag = '0' left join logistics_truckdb.tru_truck t on a.truck_id = t.truck_id and t.del_flag = '0'
